item.title: Convert Formula
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“jkicool, post:1, topic:406467”]So i need to convert and having trouble

[tt]case 10100:
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
itemDef.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
itemDef.anIntArray156[0] = 528;
itemDef.anIntArray160[0] = 6073;
itemDef.anInt174 = 20000;
itemDef.modelZoom = 840;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 280;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0;
itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56;
itemDef.anInt165 = 20001;
itemDef.anInt200 = 20001;
itemDef.anInt188 = -1;
itemDef.anInt164 = -1;
itemDef.anInt175 = -1;
itemDef.anInt197 = -1;
itemDef.name = “Orange Whip”;
itemDef.description = “a Orange Whip”.getBytes();
break;[/tt]

[font=times new roman][size=14pt]To this:[/size][/font]
[sup]case 13354:
itemDef.modelid = 62709;
itemDef.name = “Pernix body”;
itemDef.description = “Pernix body”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1378;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 485;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 2042;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 7;
itemDef.anInt165 = 62744;
itemDef.anInt200 = 62765;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[2] = “Check-charges”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;[/sup][/quote]

Change the variable names

Problem solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Convert Formula
item.dc:creator: @jkicool jkicool
item.description:
@jkicool wrote:

So i need to convert and having trouble

[tt]case 10100:
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
itemDef.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
itemDef.anIntArray156[0] = 528;
itemDef.anIntArray160[0] = 6073;
itemDef.anInt174 = 20000;
itemDef.modelZoom = 840;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 280;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0;
itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56;
itemDef.anInt165 = 20001;
itemDef.anInt200 = 20001;
itemDef.anInt188 = -1;
itemDef.anInt164 = -1;
itemDef.anInt175 = -1;
itemDef.anInt197 = -1;
itemDef.name = “Orange Whip”;
itemDef.description = “a Orange Whip”.getBytes();
break;[/tt]

[font=times new roman][size=14pt]To this:[/size][/font]
[sup]case 13354:
itemDef.modelid = 62709;
itemDef.name = “Pernix body”;
itemDef.description = “Pernix body”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1378;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 485;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 2042;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 7;
itemDef.anInt165 = 62744;
itemDef.anInt200 = 62765;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[2] = “Check-charges”;

break;[/sup]
